item.description: Come to my house in Haverhill for leftovers and a book swap party the sunday after Thanksgiving. I always have tons of food left and you can either bring your leftovers or just come for mine. Bring any books you've read and loved (or hated) and we'll all end up with some new things to read for the winter.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Thanksgiving leftovers and book swap
